page.title: 03COMMUNICATIONS
page.content:
{ The Post Office serves the community. Before postmen go out on delivery rounds, they have to sort the letters out which have arrived overnight, into street and house number order. Large bundles and letters for firms are delivered in vans.{Special Letters}are signed for as they are delivered. These are recorded or registered letters. Other services include:-{Data {Post, Express Post}and special delivery for speed. There are{316 Post {Boxes}and{72 Sub-Post Offices}in the Chesterfield area.
The{Financial Accounts Department}is on West Bars, Chesterfield. Here, they do the Post Office accounting for the whole country, sending and receiving bills and documents relating to the postal service.
